name: Postcard Set
description:
A set of 3 Limited Edition Postcards, featuring Artworks 'Jack' 'Elvis & Tiger' and 'Peter'.

The cards are standard postcard size, they are printed onto white 300gsm card.

The cards come in cello bags.

The original artwork was created with ink, acrylic, pencil, pastel and charcoal.

Limited to an edition of 100 each, they can be framed as limited edition mini prints.

name: Festive Card Set
description:
Set of 3 cards featuring 'Dear Girl' 'Owl' and 'Christmas French Bulldog'.

The cards are 10.9cm by 15.2 cm, standard postcard size.

They are printed onto 350gsm, satin coated card with a message inside that reads 'Wishing You an Utterly Charming Time'

The cards come with white envelopes that are sealed in clear cello bags.

The original Artworks were created using, pencil, acrylics, pastels, ink and pen.

The cards are a limited edition and are perfect for creating mini framed

artwork.

name: Puffins
description:
Limited Edition Giclee Print of Original Drawing 'Puffins' 

The cost of the print is £39.00.

Prints are signed and Numbered by Artist Erin Petson.

The print is limited to an edition of 100.

Measurement is 48.3 x 32.9 cm.

Print Technique is Ink Jet.

'Puffins' was created with pencil, ink, acrylic paint and charcoal.

Paper is Bockingford Inkjet 190 g/m

Post & Delivery, your beautiful new print is carefully posted in a protective tube with acid free tissue paper, and orders are posted every Friday with love.

Artwork remains the copyright of Erin Petson and may not be reproduced, thankyou.


Prints and Originals are delivered to most countries worldwide and we will normally ship your order for delivery within 2 to 3 working days, for international orders please allow approx 2-4 weeks for delivery. If you require a specific delivery date then please let us know and we will do our utmost to ensure that the artwork arrives when you want it. All shipments can be tracked. Prints are wrapped in acid free tissue paper and rolled in a postal tube. 

The prints are made on stock that is delicate and can easily be damaged, so please take care when removing the print from its tube, it is recommended that framing is arranged to preserve the print in top condition. To ensure long life of your print it is advised to avoid hanging above sources of direct heat, in direct sunlight or in damp and humid environments as this will gradually degrade the print quality.

name: Ruby Original Drawing
description:
Original Artwork 'Ruby' on fabriano artistico acid free paper 300gsm.

The artwork is signed by erin petson.

The artwork is approximately 29 cm by 42 cm.

'Ruby' was created with pencil, acrylic paint, watercolour, graphite, pastel, charcoal and indian ink.

Erin created 'Ruby' in her studio in East London and it is one of a kind, an impressionist animal illustration.

This is all about pencil work and pose, the drawing was inspired by a trip to Sweden.

Erin has exhibited her artwork worldwide and her original drawings are highly collectable her artworks are archived in the Victoria & Albert Museum.

Post & Delivery, your beautiful original artwork is carefully posted flat with acid free tissue paper, and orders are posted every Friday with love.

Framing can be arranged for you specially so please enquire.
